listitem.para: Install the packages :apt-get install quantum-serveryum install openstack-quantum

Edit /etc/quantum/quantum.conf file and modify :core_plugin = \ quantum.plugins.openvswitch.ovs_quantum_plugin.OVSQuantumPluginV2 auth_strategy = keystone fake_rabbit = False rabbit_password = passwordcore_plugin = \ quantum.plugins.openvswitch.ovs_quantum_plugin.OVSQuantumPluginV2 auth_strategy = keystone fake_rabbit = False rpc_backend=quantum.openstack.common.rpc.impl_qpid

Edit /etc/quantum/plugins/openvswitch/ovs_quantum_plugin.ini file and modify :[DATABASE] sql_connection = mysql://quantum:password@localhost:3306/quantum [OVS] tenant_network_type = gre tunnel_id_ranges = 1:1000 enable_tunneling = True
It's more handy to choose tunnel mode since you don't have to configure your physical switches for VLANs.
Edit /etc/quantum/api-paste.ini file and modify :admin_tenant_name = service admin_user = quantum admin_password = password
Start the services :service quantum-server restartservice quantum-server restart chkconfig quantum-server on
